participant_2.background:
I like to make short films.
My mother is a well known celebrity.
I have traveled overseas many times.
I have been on the tv news six times.

content.text: I love making short films! I'm glad to meet someone else who enjoys it.
Thanks! I've been doing it for a few years now, and I'm really enjoying it.
What's your favorite type of short film to make?
I like to make comedy shorts, but I've also made some dramas and documentaries.
That's awesome! I love comedy shorts too.
What's your favorite one that you've made?
I have a few, but I think my favorite one is called "The Day the Earth Stood Still." It's about a group of friends who are trying to stop the world from ending.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to see it sometime.
Sure! I can send you a link.
Thanks! I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
What's your favorite short film that you've made?
I think my favorite one is called "The Girl Who Lived in the Moon." It's about a girl who lives on the moon and has to come to earth to save her family.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to see it.
Sure! I can send you a link.
Thanks! I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
